subject: Baseball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi said he relied on the umpiring crew chief’s knowledge of the ground rules on a batted ball that was ruled — incorrectly — to be a home run.
snippet: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi said he relied on the umpiring crew chief’s knowledge of the ground rules on a batted ball that was ruled — incorrectly — to be a home run.
